cz.cvut.fit.genepi.presentationLayer.controller

Class UserController

  • java.lang.Object
    • cz.cvut.fit.genepi.presentationLayer.controller.UserController

  • @Controller
@SessionAttributes(value="user")
public class UserController
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is a controller class which handles requests connected with a user.

    • Method Detail

      • userCreateGET

        @RequestMapping(value="/user/create",
                method=GET)
public java.lang.String userCreateGET(org.springframework.ui.Model model,
                                            javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
        Handles the request to access page for creating new user.
        Parameters:
        model - the model to be filled for view.
        Returns:
        the string of a view to be rendered.

      • userCreatePOST

        @RequestMapping(value="/user/create",
                method=POST)
public java.lang.String userCreatePOST(@ModelAttribute(value="user")
                                             UserVO user,
                                             org.springframework.validation.BindingResult result,
                                             java.util.Locale locale,
                                             org.springframework.ui.Model model,
                                             javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
        Handles the request to submit a new user.
        Parameters:
        user - the user which was filled in form at front-end. It is grabbed from POST string and validated.
        result - the result of binding form from front-end to an UserEntity. It is used to determine if there were some errors during binding.
        locale - the user's locale.
        model - the model to be filled for view.
        Returns:
        the string of a view to be rendered if the binding has errors and if there is a duplication of username otherwise, the string of an address to which the user will be redirected.

      • userOverviewGET

        @RequestMapping(value="/user/{userId}/overview",
                method=GET)
public java.lang.String userOverviewGET(@PathVariable(value="userId")
                                              java.lang.Integer userId,
                                              org.springframework.ui.Model model,
                                              javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
        Handles the request to access page with user's overview.
        Parameters:
        userId - the id of a user for whom the overview is to be rendered.
        model - the model to be filled for view.
        Returns:
        the string of a view to be rendered.

        @RequestMapping(value="/user/{userId}/edit",

public java.lang.String userEditGET(@PathVariable(value="userId")
                                          int userId,
                                          org.springframework.ui.Model model,
                                          javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
        Handles the request to page where the user can be edited.

        userId - the id of a user to be edited.
        model - the model to be filled for view.
        Returns:
        the string of a view to be rendered.

      • userEditPOST

        @RequestMapping(value="/user/{userId}/edit",
                method=POST)
public java.lang.String userEditPOST(@ModelAttribute(value="user")
                                           UserVO user,
                                           org.springframework.validation.BindingResult result,
                                           @PathVariable(value="userId")
                                           int userId,
                                           org.springframework.ui.Model model,
                                           javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
        Handles the request to submit edited user.
        Parameters:
        user - the user which was edited in form at front-end. It is grabbed from POST string and validated.
        result - the result of binding form from front-end to an UserEntity. It is used to determine if there were some errors during binding.
        model - the model to be filled for view.
        Returns:
        the string of a view to be rendered if the binding has errors, otherwise, the string of an address to which the user will be redirected.

      • userChangePasswordGET

        @RequestMapping(value="/user/{userId}/change-password",
                method=GET)
public java.lang.String userChangePasswordGET(@PathVariable(value="userId")
                                                    java.lang.Integer userId,
                                                    org.springframework.ui.Model model,
                                                    javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
        Handles the request to access page where user's password is changed.
        Parameters:
        userId - the id of a user whose password is edited.
        model - the model to be filled for view.
        Returns:
        the string of a view to be rendered.

      • userChangePasswordPOST

        @RequestMapping(value="/user/{userId}/change-password",
                method=POST)
public java.lang.String userChangePasswordPOST(@ModelAttribute(value="user")
                                                     UserVO user,
                                                     org.springframework.validation.BindingResult result,
                                                     @PathVariable(value="userId")
                                                     int userId,
                                                     @RequestParam(value="passwordAgain")
                                                     java.lang.String passwordAgain,
                                                     java.util.Locale locale,
                                                     org.springframework.ui.Model model,
                                                     javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
        Parameters:
        user - the user whose password was edited in form at front-end. It is grabbed from POST string and validated.
        result - the result of binding form from front-end to an UserEntity. It is used to determine if there were some errors during binding.
        userId - the id of a user whose password is edited.
        locale - the user's locale.
        model - the model to be filled for view.
        Returns:
        the string of a view to be rendered if the binding has errors, otherwise, the string of an address to which the user will be redirected.
